channel.title: Posts on Nico Stuart
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Nico Stuart

item.title: My Short Story 'Possessed by My Dead Boyfriend's Haunted Dildo' is now available on Kobo!
item.description: After the sudden death of his partner, Nathan is in grief. He tries to cope with this loss through psychotherapy and wild nights with strangers. To help calm his sorrows, Nathan tries using the DIY sex toy that he made with his boyfriend. To his surprise, there’s something more powerful than orgasm to be found when playing with this toy!

item.title: From Cinza: My Poetry Repository and Erotic Dream Mag
my first night at the baths
item.description: A short erotica written in prose. Published for free on Literotica.
